resources.string: In this application you will find relevant information about tourism in the municipality of San Rafael, you will find the guide to the main sites to visit, festivals and tourism directory, such as information on hotels and restaurants to organize your travel plan our town.
This application is made by Katherine Osorio Murillo, for mobile applications course at the University of Antioquia

 paved road from the town center, run by the Cooperativa San Rafael Multiactiva.

Adjacent to the hospital and the park Mother, the house of culture was named after Clemente Antonio Giraldo, first popularly elected mayor and who inaugurated the work. The space treasures printed knowledge in the books of the library and a promoter, broadcaster and former artistic.
Km 2.5 Route El Arenal, San Rafael (Antioquia)

San Rafael is a municipality of Colombia, located in the sub-region East of the department of Antioquia. It bounded on the north by the municipalities of Alexandria and San Roque, in the east and south with the municipality of San Carlos and to the west with the municipalities of Guatapé and Alexandria.
